article.title: Cobblestone Construction Awarded Contract for Construction of New UAS Headquarters
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Benchmark Contracting Incorporated, dba Cobblestone Construction, has received a $6 million firm-fixed-price contract for the construction of a new 15,000 SF to 20,000 SF Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) 432d Wing Headquarters, Creech Air Force Base, Las Vegas, to support the Air Force unmanned aerial system training and operation missions.
